page.title: 09Employment
page.content: Employment In Moretonhampstead there are four main scources of employment, The White Hart Hotel,The Co-op,Gales sawmills and Thompsons lorry dep'ot.The White Hart Hotel employs approximatly thirty people.These people are used to cook the meals and clean the guests rooms. The Co-op in Moretonhampstead employs twelve people to pack goods and man the cash registers.Gales sawmills employs eight people for the preparation of wood to be sold. Most of the wood is made into gates. Thompsons lorry dep'ot employs about thirty workers to drive lorries. They drive lorries with cargoes of Pedigree pet foods,Heinz foods,Proctor and gamble and Fairy Liquid Powders.
